Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  cardConstraintOnFieldChild


Entry:        CardConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "It is a group entry with a card constraint on a field's child"
Property:     Thing1 0..*
              Thing1.Thing2 1..2

Element:      Thing1   // Change to Group
Property:     Thing2 0..*

Element:      Thing2
Value:        string
